@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2011 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Gabriel Munteanu (gabios) Christopher Zuendorf (czuendorf) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The popup represents a widget that gets shown above other widgets, usually to present more info/details regarding an item in the application. There are 3 usages for now: 

 var widget = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Button("Error!");
 var popup = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup(widget);
 popup.show();

Here we show a popup consisting of a single buttons alerting the user that an error has occurred. It will be centered to the screen. 

 var label = new qx.ui.mobile.basic.Label("Item1");
 var widget = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Button("Error!");
 var popup = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup(widget, label);
 popup.show();
 widget.addListener("tap", function(){
   popup.hide();
 });

In this case everything is as above, except that the popup will get shown next to "label" so that the user can understand that the info presented is about the "Item1" we also add a tap listener to the button that will hide out popup. Once created, the instance is reused between show/hide calls. 

 var widget = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Button("Error!");
 var popup = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup(widget);
 popup.placeTo(25,100);
 popup.show();

Same as the first example, but this time the popup will be shown at the 25,100 coordinates.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} the widget that will be shown in the popup
@param.description: the widget that will be shown in the popup

@param.name: @param
@param.body: anchor {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget?} optional parameter, a widget to attach this popup to
@param.description: optional parameter, a widget to attach this popup to

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label/caption/text of the qx.ui.mobile.basic.Atom instance

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Any URI String supported by qx.ui.mobile.basic.Image to display an icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the popup should be displayed modal.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Indicates whether the a modal popup should disappear when user taps/clicks on Blocker.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called whenever the position of the popup should be updated.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method shows the popup. First it updates the position, then registers the event handlers, and shows it.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: properties {Map} The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.
@param.description: The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hides the popup.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: properties {Map} The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.
@param.description: The animation properties to set. Key / value pairs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hides the popup after a given time delay.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the shown state of this popup.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the popup is shown or not.
@return.description: whether the popup is shown or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the visibility of this popup.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method positions the popup widget at the coordinates specified.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: left {Integer} - the value the will be set to container's left style property
@param.description: - the value the will be set to container's left style property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: top {Integer} - the value the will be set to container's top style property
@param.description: - the value the will be set to container's top style property

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Tracks the user tap on root and hides the widget if pointerdown event occurs outside of the widgets bounds.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Centers this widget to window's center position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the position of this element (left, top, margins…)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Registers all needed event listeners

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Unregisters all needed event listeners

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method creates the container where the popup's widget will be placed and adds it to the popup.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} - what to show in the popup
@param.description: - what to show in the popup

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the title atom widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the widget that will be shown in this popup. This method can be used in the case when you have removed the widget from the popup or you haven't passed it in the constructor.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} - what to show in the popup
@param.description: - what to show in the popup

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A widget to attach this popup to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the title widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method removes the widget shown in the popup.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget|null} The removed widget or null if the popup doesn't have an attached widget
@return.description: The removed widget or null if the popup doesn't have an attached widget
